name: Intersection of Main St and Hubbard Ave
description: The bustling intersection of Main Street and Hubbard Avenue. You are at the intersection of Main St and Hubbard Ave, a place where the past and present meet with a cheerful, optimistic smile. Main St continues its journey to the west, a ribbon of charming commerce. Hubbard Ave stretches to the south, disappearing into a neighborhood of brand new homes. The iconic clock tower looms in the distance, its hands ticking steadily, a silent monument to the town's progress. To the east, the Town Theater stands as a testament to the town's love of entertainment.
